about_the_game:
Dive into Surfpunk, a world where fierce waves and sunken ruins hold the key to survival. As a Raider, your mission is clear: surf solo or with your squad into the perilous waters of The Fallen World to scavenge ancient technologies while evading the deadly Sumi – ink-like creatures that corrupt these islands. Complete your mission and escape the tsunami with as much loot as your barge can carry!

Crush 'n Rush!

Feel the rush of adrenaline-fueled combat as you fight your way through the ruins, securing Evress – an ancient energy source vital to the Raider way of life. Master your weapon class and coordinate with your crew to unleash powerful combinations that turn the tide of battle. Whether tanking the Sumi’s relentless onslaught, supporting the team, or dealing pinpoint damage, every Raider’s role is critical for survival.

But beware – the longer you stay, the deadlier the Sumi become. Larger foes will knock your team off-balance, requiring quick reaction times and a tactical approach. Make split-second decisions on when to grab loot and when to make a run for it. Fill your barge, push your team to the limit, and ride the wave to victory!

Extract ‘n Escape

Team up with up to three friends to extract Evress prisms and carry them to your barge while fending off the Sumi. Work quickly, as the extraction triggers an earthquake. As time runs out, the water rises and a giant tsunami washes over the level. Surf with your loot-laden barge to the exit, but watch out for wipeouts and wrong turns!

Craft essential tools and use the world around you to outsmart the Sumi. Scale cliffs with ladders and blow away barriers with explosives to find more efficient ways to extract Evress. Combine various tools with your Rushboard tow cable for even more destruction. Ingenuity and improvisation are at the heart of the Raider lifestyle!

The Beastship

Return your plunder to the Beastship – your floating home on the seas brimming with opportunities to prepare for your next journey. Share your loot with the onboard NPCs to craft new weapons, enhance your gear, customize your looks, and unlock new abilities. The Beastship also offers a place to pick up some side quests for unique loot or just hang out in between raids as you discover the world of Surfpunk.

Changing Tides

No two raids are alike! Each journey sends you into a dynamic world of shifting islands, teeming with unique challenges. From ancient Navi Towers that reveal crucial parts of the map to corrupted islands that can be cleared for bonuses, every run is a new adventure filled with surprises.

Key Features:

  • Hack’nSlash Extraction: Play a unique game loop blending extraction gameplay with action RPG mechanics.

  • Shred Solo or Together: Play solo or join with up to 3 other Raiders to maximize loot hauls and survive against the relentless Sumi.

  • Raider Classes: Experiment with unique classes and loadouts, each with a different play style and a role to play on your squad.

  • Dynamic Tropics: Navigate procedurally generated islands and objectives while exploring a visually striking, bold tropical environment.

  • Ocean Playground: Use your Rushboards to sling barrels, save stranded Raiders, and tow your loot. Surf the tsunami while avoiding obstacles as you escape the archipelago.

  • Beastship: Hang out on the Beastship – your home base. Your crew is there to upgrade your gear and provide you with a hearty meal as you plan for your next adventure.

  • Shoreline Swagger: Personalize your Raider and Rushboard for maximum style points!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-Core 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060, or Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, or Radeon RX 5600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Become a wave-shredding Raider in this intense, PvE co-op extraction ARPG. Hop on your Rushboard, explore endless islands, and loot powerful ancient technology. Team up to hack ‘n slash through hordes of monsters and escape the chaos in style. Surf, Shred, Scavenge, Repeat!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
